channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: I Fought A War Against Radical Islamists Like The One New York Is About To Elect
item.description: Radical Islam has made its way into America. It is already here, and it is spreading. America cannot be consumed by it.

item.description: Trump officials are fleeing their homes in the face of left-wing threats, but The Atlantic says the problem is actually Trump's rhetoric.

item.description: To abandon limited government is to corrupt conservatism.

item.title: The U.S. Should Resume Nuclear Weapons Testing

item.title: John Roberts And Congress Need To Immediately Stop Gross Ethical Violations By Federal Judges
item.description: Judges have life tenure to insulate them from political pressure, not so they can act like politicians in robes.
